<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/57663</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>57663</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_527</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_527</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Ejercicios de resolución de ecuaciones</string>
            <string language="en">Exercises on solving equations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übungen auf dem Lösen von von Gleichungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercices sur résoudre des équations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercícios em resolver equações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazioni sul risolvere le equazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκήσεις στην επίλυση των εξισώσεων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">"unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la resolución de ecuaciones. Se estudian ecuaciones de primer, segundo, tercer y cuarto grado; ecuaciones irracionales y ecuaciones trigonométricas sencillas."</string>
            <string language="en">"teaching unit which uses simulations to solve equations. It studies equations of degrees one, two, three and four; irrational equations and simple trigonometric equations."</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">primer grado</string>
            <string language="en">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ecuación</string>
            <string language="en">equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ecuación trigonométrica</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometric equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ecuación irracional</string>
            <string language="en">irrational equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">segundo grado</string>
            <string language="en">quadratic</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Gleichungen zu lösen. Sie studiert Gleichungen 
von Grad einer, zwei, drei und vier; vernunftwidrige Gleichungen
und einfache trigonometrische Gleichungen."</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de résoudre des équations. Elle étudie des 
équations des degrés un, deux, trois et quatre ; équations 
irrationnelles et équations trigonométriques simples."</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"unidade ensinando que usos simulações resolver
equações. Estuda equações dos graus um, dois, três e 
quatro; equações irrational e equações trigonometric 
simples."</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
risolvere le equazioni. Studia le equazioni dei gradi uno, due, 
tre e quattro; equazioni irrazionali ed equazioni 
trigonometriche semplici."</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις
για να λύσει τις εξισώσεις. Μελετά τις εξισώσεις των βαθμών
ένα, δύο, τρία και τέσσερα  παράλογες εξισώσεις και απλές
trigonometric εξισώσεις."</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">trigonometrische Gleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vernunftwidrige Gleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">quadratisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">linéaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équation trigonométrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équation irrationnelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">quadratique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">equação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">equação trigonometric</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">equação irrational</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">quadrático</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lineare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">equazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">equazione trigonometrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">equazione irrazionale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quadratico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμμικός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξίσωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">trigonometric εξίσωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παράλογη εξίσωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δευτέρου βαθμού</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
